name: Playing with Fire (Emmaline, Luke Mayo, Megan Villablanca, Les Garcia)
name_original: Playing with Fire (Emmaline, Luke Mayo, Megan Villablanca, Les Garcia)
description:
The Product of a ~Frosty Game Jam~, This is a relaxing 2D game where you play as a Lumber Jack who has recently received a firey pet. You are tasked with keeping your flame well fed with wood from the trees around your house, and maybe your furniture if resources get a little short. 

Music/Big Code : Luke Mayo

Also Big Code: Emmaline Kelly

UI / 2DArtist / Designer: Lesley Garcia

Character Artists: Natalie Wyatt, Megan Villablanca

Attribution 3.0 Sfx used:

http://soundbible.com/1359-Small-Fireball.html

http://soundbible.com/1467-Grenade-Explosion.html

http://soundbible.com/1090-Hot-Sizzling.html
